Team up with our data scientist, underwriting, data engineering teams closely to drive customer segmentation, develop innovative credit strategies, and perform portfolio analyses Dive deep into our lending portfolio performance and design credit policy proposals that will improve business KPIs Use big data technology to mine massive transactional data and translate credit risk analyses into actionable business opportunities Design, implement, and monitor tests that explore new methodologies and estimate key metrics for our acquisition strategies and credit policy Actively contribute creative ideas to design new financing products for our QuickBooks customers', 'Drive new lending business initiatives from credit risk expert perspective ', 'Team up with our data scientist, underwriting, data engineering teams closely to drive customer segmentation, develop innovative credit strategies, and perform portfolio analyses ', 'Use big data technology to mine massive transactional data and translate credit risk analyses into actionable business opportunities ', 'Overview', 'MS/PhD in quantitative fields such as Statistics, Operational Research, Industry Engineering, Economics etc. Or Bachelor Degree in same fields with 5+ years working experience 5+ years working experience in an analytics related role. Lending or Fintech experience strongly preferred Having risk related domain knowledge, such as credit bureau attributes and scoring, customer acquisition, scorecard modeling, loan amount assignment, pricing, loss forecasting, or collections Strong business acumen with the ability to understand business problems and KPIs from multiple stakeholder perspectives Proven analytical thinker that can leverage excellent communication skills to translate complex quantitative and qualitative data into actionable insights Ability to learn fast and work in a fast-paced working environment, and confidence in taking end-to-end ownership of a project Proficient in one of the following analytics tools, such as Python, R, and SAS. Advanced Excel skills with strong logical and SQL/relational database query skills Experience developing beautiful dashboards with visualization tools such as Tableau, Looker, or Domo Meticulous attention to detail']

job_title: Senior Scientific Researcher, Computational Image Analysis and Digital Pathology
job_text: ['', 'Research COMPANY/DIVISION', ' You have supported publications in high impact scientific, technical or medical journals ', ' You are fluent in data processing and management including the ability to query large data sets. ', ' You have experience analyzing data that would support innovative clinical development programs ', 'JOB FUNCTION', 'Who We Are', ' You have a PhD in computer science, biomedical engineering, biomedical imaging, or a related area. ', 'The Position', ' You can represent the digital pathology team through interactions with key investigators and public presentations ', ' You can drive scientific and technical innovation collaboratively with other members of the department ', 'SCHEDULE', ' You enjoy working with pathologists, cancer biologists, bioinformaticians, and statisticians to develop algorithms to advance our digital pathology-based biomarker development ', ' You have the skills to participate and thrive in a fast-paced, interactive and team-oriented culture ', ' You can effectively communicate and collaborate with cross-functional teams of biologists and clinical scientists ', 'Job Facts', ' You are able to present complex results, both verbally and in writing, to bioinformatics audiences, non-bioinformatics audiences, and management ', ' You have a PhD in computer science, biomedical engineering, biomedical imaging, or a related area.  You demonstrate extensive experience with image processing methodology including machine/deep learning, segmentation methods and computer vision.  You are fluent in data processing and management including the ability to query large data sets.  You can represent the digital pathology team through interactions with key investigators and public presentations  You have the skills to participate and thrive in a fast-paced, interactive and team-oriented culture  You can effectively communicate and collaborate with cross-functional teams of biologists and clinical scientists  You enjoy working with pathologists, cancer biologists, bioinformaticians, and statisticians to develop algorithms to advance our digital pathology-based biomarker development  You can drive scientific and technical innovation collaboratively with other members of the department  You have experience analyzing data that would support innovative clinical development programs  You have supported publications in high impact scientific, technical or medical journals  You are comfortable writing code in languages such as R, Matlab, Perl, or Python for bioinformatics analysis workflows  You are able to present complex results, both verbally and in writing, to bioinformatics audiences, non-bioinformatics audiences, and management ', 'JOB TYPE', 'Who You Are', ' You are comfortable writing code in languages such as R, Matlab, Perl, or Python for bioinformatics analysis workflows ', ' You demonstrate extensive experience with image processing methodology including machine/deep learning, segmentation methods and computer vision. ']

['', 'Data Engineer ', 'Work closely with the Risk Decision Science team to design, build, deploy and operate their data science, data analytics solutions.', 'Design and develop ETL (extract-transform-load) processes to validate and transform data, calculate metrics and model features, populate data models etc., using Spark, Python, SQL, and other technologies in the AWS cloud.', 'Lead by example, demonstrating best practices for code development and optimization, unit testing, CI/CD, performance testing, capacity planning, documentation, monitoring, alerting, and incident response in order to ensure data availability, data quality, usability and required performance.', '4+ years of hands-on data engineering experience.', 'How You Will Lead', 'Knowledge of enacting service level agreements and the appropriate escalation and communication plans to maintain them.', 'Partner closely with Data Scientists, BI developers and Product Managers to design and implement data models, database schemas, data structures, and processing logic to support various data science, analytics, machine learning, and BI workflows.', 'MS in Computer Science, Mathematics, or a similar field.', 'Define SLAs for data availability and correctness. Automate data availability and quality monitoring and alerts. ['', 'Ability to learn fast and work in a fast-paced working environment, and confidence in taking end-to-end ownership of a project ', 'Partner with our data science and data engineering teams to leverage the latest technology and models to serve our QuickBooks customers‚Äô financing needs', 'Build great ownership and leadership by working collaboratively with business partners (product development, product management, marketing, data engineering, compliance, underwriting team etc.) to design new products to increase our market share. ', 'Design, implement, and monitor tests that explore new methodologies and estimate key metrics for our acquisition strategies and credit policy ', 'Proven analytical thinker that can leverage excellent communication skills to translate complex quantitative and qualitative data into actionable insights ', 'Experience developing beautiful dashboards with visualization tools such as Tableau, Looker, or Domo ', 'How You Will Lead', '5+ years working experience in an analytics related role. Lending or Fintech experience strongly preferred ', 'MS/PhD in quantitative fields such as Statistics, Operational Research, Industry Engineering, Economics etc. Or Bachelor Degree in same fields with 5+ years working experience ', 'Meticulous attention to detail', 'Having risk related domain knowledge, such as credit bureau attributes and scoring, customer acquisition, scorecard modeling, loan amount assignment, pricing, loss forecasting, or collections ', 'Strong business acumen with the ability to understand business problems and KPIs from multiple stakeholder perspectives ', 'Drive new lending business initiatives from credit risk expert perspective Ensure our loan portfolio is within our risk tolerance while growing the portfolio. Partner with our data science and data engineering teams to leverage the latest technology and models to serve our QuickBooks customers‚Äô financing needs', 'Actively contribute creative ideas to design new financing products for our QuickBooks customers', "What You'll Bring", 'Dive deep into our lending portfolio performance and design credit policy proposals that will improve business KPIs ', 'Advanced Excel skills with strong logical and SQL/relational database query skills ', 'Ensure our loan portfolio is within our risk tolerance while growing the portfolio. ', 'Proficient in one of the following analytics tools, such as Python, R, and SAS. ', 'Build great ownership and leadership by working collaboratively with business partners (product development, product management, marketing, data engineering, compliance, underwriting team etc.) to design new products to increase our market share. Team up with our data scientist, underwriting, data engineering teams closely to drive customer segmentation, develop innovative credit strategies, and perform portfolio analyses Dive deep into our lending portfolio performance and design credit policy proposals that will improve business KPIs Use big data technology to mine massive transactional data and translate credit risk analyses into actionable business opportunities Design, implement, and monitor tests that explore new methodologies and estimate key metrics for our acquisition strategies and credit policy Actively contribute creative ideas to design new financing products for our QuickBooks customers', 'Drive new lending business initiatives from credit risk expert perspective ', 'Team up with our data scientist, underwriting, data engineering teams closely to drive customer segmentation, develop innovative credit strategies, and perform portfolio analyses ', 'Use big data technology to mine massive transactional data and translate credit risk analyses into actionable business opportunities ', 'Overview', 'MS/PhD in quantitative fields such as Statistics, Operational Research, Industry Engineering, Economics etc. Or Bachelor Degree in same fields with 5+ years working experience 5+ years working experience in an analytics related role. Lending or Fintech experience strongly preferred Having risk related domain knowledge, such as credit bureau attributes and scoring, customer acquisition, scorecard modeling, loan amount assignment, pricing, loss forecasting, or collections Strong business acumen with the ability to understand business problems and KPIs from multiple stakeholder perspectives Proven analytical thinker that can leverage excellent communication skills to translate complex quantitative and qualitative data into actionable insights Ability to learn fast and work in a fast-paced working environment, and confidence in taking end-to-end ownership of a project Proficient in one of the following analytics tools, such as Python, R, and SAS. Advanced Excel skills with strong logical and SQL/relational database query skills Experience developing beautiful dashboards with visualization tools such as Tableau, Looker, or Domo Meticulous attention to detail']

['', 'Conduct end-to-end research, utilizing a wide variety of methodologies (both, qual and quant), to help us gain confidence in our understanding of our users (current and future), their needs and the opportunity this uncovers for our products.Work closely with marketing teams and product leaders to define the most important research questions, lead research, facilitate synthesis to get to compelling insights, and finally turn the insights into action.Define the most important insights that drive seamless customer experiences and delight and work with Marketing to action these and translate them into business impact.', 'Proven ability to use customer insights to drive a holistic marketing strategy.', 'Conduct end-to-end research, utilizing a wide variety of methodologies (both, qual and quant), to help us gain confidence in our understanding of our users (current and future), their needs and the opportunity this uncovers for our products.', 'Familiarity with design thinking and lean experimentation is a plus.', 'Ability to distill research findings into clear, and compelling data backed presentations, data visualizations, and/or infographics.', 'Define the most important insights that drive seamless customer experiences and delight and work with Marketing to action these and translate them into business impact.', "What You'll Bring", 'Overview', '7+ years of work experience as a marketing researcher, preferably in the technology sector. Experience on the vendor side is also applicable.Experience with various qualitative and quantitative research methodologies such as ethnography, contextual interviews, surveys, conjoint, customer journeys and more.Proven ability to use customer insights to drive a holistic marketing strategy.Ability to distill research findings into clear, and compelling data backed presentations, data visualizations, and/or infographics.Great interpersonal skills to collaborate with a wide diversity of colleagues in other disciplines and cultures.Familiarity with design thinking and lean experimentation is a plus.', 'Great interpersonal skills to collaborate with a wide diversity of colleagues in other disciplines and cultures.', '7+ years of work experience as a marketing researcher, preferably in the technology sector. Experience on the vendor side is also applicable.', 'How You Will Lead', 'Work closely with marketing teams and product leaders to define the most important research questions, lead research, facilitate synthesis to get to compelling insights, and finally turn the insights into action.', 'Experience with various qualitative and quantitative research methodologies such as ethnography, contextual interviews, surveys, conjoint, customer journeys and more.']

['', 'Research COMPANY/DIVISION', 'Requirements:', 'SCHEDULE', 'Familiarity with immunological principles and a strong working knowledge in common lab techniques such as primary mammalian cell culture, immunoassay, and molecular techniques is necessary.', 'Job Facts', 'Clear oral/written communication skills and ability to productively interact with other teams is a must.', 'Who You Are', 'The Position', 'JOB FUNCTION', 'PhD in a relevant biomedical field, and 3+ years of laboratory experience in an academic or industry setting, relevant to human fibrotic disease. Non-PhD candidates with 5+ years of demonstrable experience in kidney/fibrosis research are also encouraged to apply.', 'Creative problem-solving skills and an ability to integrate results into a larger disease-oriented context is preferred.', 'Who We Are', 'JOB TYPE', 'Those with demonstrable expertise in fibrosis biology as evidenced by high quality publications will be given preference.', 'PhD in a relevant biomedical field, and 3+ years of laboratory experience in an academic or industry setting, relevant to human fibrotic disease. Non-PhD candidates with 5+ years of demonstrable experience in kidney/fibrosis research are also encouraged to apply.Familiarity with immunological principles and a strong working knowledge in common lab techniques such as primary mammalian cell culture, immunoassay, and molecular techniques is necessary.Clear oral/written communication skills and ability to productively interact with other teams is a must.Creative problem-solving skills and an ability to integrate results into a larger disease-oriented context is preferred.Those with demonstrable expertise in fibrosis biology as evidenced by high quality publications will be given preference.']

job_title: Senior Scientific Researcher, Computational Image Analysis and Digital Pathology
job_text: ['', 'Research COMPANY/DIVISION', ' You have supported publications in high impact scientific, technical or medical journals ', ' You are fluent in data processing and management including the ability to query large data sets. ', ' You have experience analyzing data that would support innovative clinical development programs ', 'JOB FUNCTION', 'Who We Are', ' You have a PhD in computer science, biomedical engineering, biomedical imaging, or a related area. ', 'The Position', ' You can represent the digital pathology team through interactions with key investigators and public presentations ', ' You can drive scientific and technical innovation collaboratively with other members of the department ', 'SCHEDULE', ' You enjoy working with pathologists, cancer biologists, bioinformaticians, and statisticians to develop algorithms to advance our digital pathology-based biomarker development ', ' You have the skills to participate and thrive in a fast-paced, interactive and team-oriented culture ', ' You can effectively communicate and collaborate with cross-functional teams of biologists and clinical scientists ', 'Job Facts', ' You are able to present complex results, both verbally and in writing, to bioinformatics audiences, non-bioinformatics audiences, and management ', ' You have a PhD in computer science, biomedical engineering, biomedical imaging, or a related area.  You demonstrate extensive experience with image processing methodology including machine/deep learning, segmentation methods and computer vision.  You are fluent in data processing and management including the ability to query large data sets.  You can represent the digital pathology team through interactions with key investigators and public presentations  You have the skills to participate and thrive in a fast-paced, interactive and team-oriented culture  You can effectively communicate and collaborate with cross-functional teams of biologists and clinical scientists  You enjoy working with pathologists, cancer biologists, bioinformaticians, and statisticians to develop algorithms to advance our digital pathology-based biomarker development  You can drive scientific and technical innovation collaboratively with other members of the department  You have experience analyzing data that would support innovative clinical development programs  You have supported publications in high impact scientific, technical or medical journals  You are comfortable writing code in languages such as R, Matlab, Perl, or Python for bioinformatics analysis workflows  You are able to present complex results, both verbally and in writing, to bioinformatics audiences, non-bioinformatics audiences, and management ', 'JOB TYPE', 'Who You Are', ' You are comfortable writing code in languages such as R, Matlab, Perl, or Python for bioinformatics analysis workflows ', ' You demonstrate extensive experience with image processing methodology including machine/deep learning, segmentation methods and computer vision. ']

['', 'Research COMPANY/DIVISION', 'Applicants should have a MS or PhD degree in biochemistry, cell biology, immunology or related science.The position requires a minimum of 10 years of hands-on laboratory experience, preferably in biochemistry, microscopy and live-cell imaging.Qualified candidates will have proven ability to design, execute, troubleshoot and interpret experiments independently.', 'Qualifications', 'The position requires a minimum of 10 years of hands-on laboratory experience, preferably in biochemistry, microscopy and live-cell imaging.', 'JOB FUNCTION', 'Who We Are', 'The Position', 'SCHEDULE', 'Experience with live cell, organ slice and intravital imaging. ', 'Applicants should have a MS or PhD degree in biochemistry, cell biology, immunology or related science.', 'Job Facts', 'The successful candidate should be highly self-motivated, and possess strong problem solving and interpersonal skills to facilitate cross-functional and cross-disciplinary interactions.', 'Experience with protein purification and characterization and biophysical methods.', 'Key Skills Include', 'JOB TYPE', 'Strong oral and written communication skills, as well as excellent documentation and organizational skills are essential.', 'Experience with protein purification and characterization and biophysical methods.Experience with live cell, organ slice and intravital imaging. Candidate should have experience handling small animals.Strong oral and written communication skills, as well as excellent documentation and organizational skills are essential.The successful candidate should be highly self-motivated, and possess strong problem solving and interpersonal skills to facilitate cross-functional and cross-disciplinary interactions.', 'Candidate should have experience handling small animals.', 'Qualified candidates will have proven ability to design, execute, troubleshoot and interpret experiments independently.']

job_title: Senior Bioinformatics Scientist, Neuroscience Reverse Translation
job_text: ['', 'Research COMPANY/DIVISION', 'in vitro ', 'Desired background:PhD plus Postdoctoral training in Computational Biology, Molecular Biology, Neuroscience or related field; or equivalentPrevious leadership experience in an independent position such as industrial scientist or professor, in a computational biology role that resulted in impactful scientific insights and publications', 'Qualifications', 'JOB FUNCTION', 'Who We Are', 'Excellent scientific communication skills: verbally and in writing; with computational and non-computational audiences; in informal 1-1 settings, team meetings, and formal seminars', 'The Position', 'SCHEDULE', 'Desired background:PhD plus Postdoctoral training in Computational Biology, Molecular Biology, Neuroscience or related field; or equivalentPrevious leadership experience in an independent position such as industrial scientist or professor, in a computational biology role that resulted in impactful scientific insights and publicationsAbility to define and lead a research agenda involving the creative analysis and integration of high dimensional datasets (e.g. single cell sequence assays, genotype or WGS data, proteomics data and CRISPR screen analysis), and, in close collaboration with bench scientists, the experimental development of resulting ideas.Experience studying the biology of neurological disease and eagerness to contribute to scientific efforts focused on understanding the molecular mechanisms underlying disease etiology.Ability to work successfully as the bioinformatics lead in cross-functional teams that contribute to drug and biomarker development.Excellent scientific communication skills: verbally and in writing; with computational and non-computational audiences; in informal 1-1 settings, team meetings, and formal seminars', 'Ability to define and lead a research agenda involving the creative analysis and integration of high dimensional datasets (e.g. single cell sequence assays, genotype or WGS data, proteomics data and CRISPR screen analysis), and, in close collaboration with bench scientists, the experimental development of resulting ideas.', 'Job Facts', 'Experience studying the biology of neurological disease and eagerness to contribute to scientific efforts focused on understanding the molecular mechanisms underlying disease etiology.', 'PhD plus Postdoctoral training in Computational Biology, Molecular Biology, Neuroscience or related field; or equivalentPrevious leadership experience in an independent position such as industrial scientist or professor, in a computational biology role that resulted in impactful scientific insights and publications', 'JOB TYPE', 'PhD plus Postdoctoral training in Computational Biology, Molecular Biology, Neuroscience or related field; or equivalent', 'Ability to work successfully as the bioinformatics lead in cross-functional teams that contribute to drug and biomarker development.', 'Previous leadership experience in an independent position such as industrial scientist or professor, in a computational biology role that resulted in impactful scientific insights and publications']

['', "The applicant should have a bachelor's or master's degree in one of the Biological sciences, and possess the instrumentation skills to operate, manage, trouble-shoot, and maintain the sorters, analyzers, and other systems. Good computer skills are essential.In addition, and equally important, are good communication skills, a teamwork spirit, the ability to work with a large, diverse group of researchers, and the flexibility to provide support for experiments that do not always fit into a regular schedule. Preference will be given to a qualified person who is able to work staggered hours and to work relatively independently.At least 3 years of experience in flow cytometry is required, and this experience must include both sorting and analysis. The individual should be able to work independently, and also work as part of a group where teamwork is essential.", 'Requirements', 'Research COMPANY/DIVISION', 'SCHEDULE', 'She/he will also be responsible on a rotating basis for doing cytokine/chemokine analysis using the Luminex system in the Luminex annex of our lab, for many researchers at Genentech who request this data. We have available robots for setting up requested assays, as well as Luminex 200‚Äôs and FlexMaps for analyzing the generated multiplex data.', 'Responsibilities', 'Job Facts', 'The Position', 'At least 3 years of experience in flow cytometry is required, and this experience must include both sorting and analysis. The individual should be able to work independently, and also work as part of a group where teamwork is essential.', 'The individual will be responsible for cell sorting and assisting with cell analysis, including data analysis and presentation, for the many researchers at Genentech who use the core Facs Facility. Users are typically from the Immunology, Molecular Biology, Medicinal Chemistry, and Early Stage Cell Culture departments.', 'JOB FUNCTION', 'In addition, and equally important, are good communication skills, a teamwork spirit, the ability to work with a large, diverse group of researchers, and the flexibility to provide support for experiments that do not always fit into a regular schedule. Preference will be given to a qualified person who is able to work staggered hours and to work relatively independently.', "The applicant should have a bachelor's or master's degree in one of the Biological sciences, and possess the instrumentation skills to operate, manage, trouble-shoot, and maintain the sorters, analyzers, and other systems. Good computer skills are essential.", 'Who We Are', 'JOB TYPE', 'The individual will be responsible for cell sorting and assisting with cell analysis, including data analysis and presentation, for the many researchers at Genentech who use the core Facs Facility. Users are typically from the Immunology, Molecular Biology, Medicinal Chemistry, and Early Stage Cell Culture departments.She/he will also be responsible on a rotating basis for doing cytokine/chemokine analysis using the Luminex system in the Luminex annex of our lab, for many researchers at Genentech who request this data. We have available robots for setting up requested assays, as well as Luminex 200‚Äôs and FlexMaps for analyzing the generated multiplex data.']

job_title: Sr. Scientific Researcher, Structural Biology and Protein Chemistry
job_text: ['', 'Research COMPANY/DIVISION', ' Working knowledge of common protein expression systems such as mammalian, insect, E coli, and in vitro translation. Expertise with modern protein purification and chromatography techniques, and knowledgeable with operating AKTA chromatography systems as well as analytical HPLC systems. Expertise in structural biology methods and structural analysis Proficiency with methods to characterize protein quality and purity, such as mass spectrometry, SEC-MALS/DLS, endotoxin assays, CD, and DSF/thermal shift assays. Expertise with biophysical and biochemical protein-protein interaction techniques and/or functional assays. Experience with basic lab automation. Passion for exploring and developing new technologies. Self-motivated, hard-working, dynamic and curious person with good communication and problem-solving skills. Team-oriented, collaborative nature with fearless attitude to tackle long standing difficult problems in drug discovery.', 'Senior Scientific Researcher, Structural Biology and Protein Chemistry', 'JOB FUNCTION', 'Who We Are', ' Expertise with biophysical and biochemical protein-protein interaction techniques and/or functional assays.', ' Self-motivated, hard-working, dynamic and curious person with good communication and problem-solving skills.', ' Team-oriented, collaborative nature with fearless attitude to tackle long standing difficult problems in drug discovery.', 'The Position', ' Expertise with modern protein purification and chromatography techniques, and knowledgeable with operating AKTA chromatography systems as well as analytical HPLC systems.', 'SCHEDULE', ' Expertise in structural biology methods and structural analysis', 'Strong candidates will have many of the following skills and attributes: ', 'Job Facts', ' Proficiency with methods to characterize protein quality and purity, such as mass spectrometry, SEC-MALS/DLS, endotoxin assays, CD, and DSF/thermal shift assays.', 'JOB TYPE', ' Passion for exploring and developing new technologies.', 'Who You Are', ' Experience with basic lab automation.', ' Working knowledge of common protein expression systems such as mammalian, insect, E coli, and in vitro translation.']

job_title: Scientific Researcher / Senior Scientific Researcher, High Throughput Protein Purification
job_text: ['', 'Research COMPANY/DIVISION', 'B.S. with 2+ years of relevant experience, Masters, or higher degree in Biology/Biochemistry or a related scientific discipline.', 'Experience in high-throughput protein purification and analysis of non-antibody proteins.', 'JOB FUNCTION', 'Who We Are', 'Requirements', 'A team-oriented individual who recognizes the strengths of everyone on the team and appreciates diverse viewpoints.', 'The Position', 'Excellent communication, organization, time management and record keeping skills with a strong emphasis on data analysis including database and ELN entry.', 'SCHEDULE', 'Job Facts', 'Experience in high-throughput protein purification and analysis of non-antibody proteins.Excellent communication, organization, time management and record keeping skills with a strong emphasis on data analysis including database and ELN entry.', 'B.S. with 2+ years of relevant experience, Masters, or higher degree in Biology/Biochemistry or a related scientific discipline.2 or more years working in an industry laboratory setting using automation and high throughput applications for protein expression, purification and characterization.Hands on experience with liquid handling systems and methods testing.Excellent agility and initiative to adapt to the changing needs for an organization and willing to take risks to get the job done.A team-oriented individual who recognizes the strengths of everyone on the team and appreciates diverse viewpoints.', 'JOB TYPE', '2 or more years working in an industry laboratory setting using automation and high throughput applications for protein expression, purification and characterization.', '1', 'Desired Skills', 'Hands on experience with liquid handling systems and methods testing.', 'Excellent agility and initiative to adapt to the changing needs for an organization and willing to take risks to get the job done.']

job_title: Scientist - Oncology Biomarker Development, Cancer Immunotherapy
job_text: ['', 'Research COMPANY/DIVISION', 'Drive scientific and technical innovation collaboratively with other members of the department. Participate and thrive in an interactive, team-oriented culture', 'Expertise in human immunology, cancer immunotherapy, oncology, cancer cell signaling pathways, and translational research is highly desirable.', 'Qualifications', 'Provide exceptional scientific leadership to molecule and disease strategy area teams, to your peers within OBD and to the organization in general', 'JOB FUNCTION', 'Experience in translational or clinical drug development including advanced understanding of critical development functions, e.g. Clinical Sciences, Biomarker Development, Translational Medicine, Clinical Pharmacology, Regulatory, Safety, Operations, Biostatistics, etc will be an advantage', 'Who We Are', 'Minimum of 3-5 years of postdoctoral translational research experience either in industry or in an academic setting', 'Design, implement and interpret biomarker strategies for clinical studies with Roche/Genentech pipeline portfolio', 'i', 'Provide exceptional scientific leadership to molecule and disease strategy area teams, to your peers within OBD and to the organization in generalDesign, implement and interpret biomarker strategies for clinical studies with Roche/Genentech pipeline portfolioHarness existing study data sets to inform reverse translational research effortsDrive scientific and technical innovation collaboratively with other members of the department. Participate and thrive in an interactive, team-oriented cultureRepresent biomarker related strategies and plans to biomarker review forums, decision committees and project teams.Represent OBD externally through presentations at key scientific meetings and interactions with investigatorsDrive biomarker related regulatory strategies and interactions with health authorities around the globe including review of relevant regulatory documentsStrive to publish scientific and methodological projects in high quality journals.', 'PhD, MD or PhD/MD degree in a relevant scientific field (e.g. pathology, immunology, molecular biology, cancer genetics, cancer biology, molecular oncology, signaling)Minimum of 3-5 years of postdoctoral translational research experience either in industry or in an academic settingExpertise in human immunology, cancer immunotherapy, oncology, cancer cell signaling pathways, and translational research is highly desirable.Demonstrated record of scientific leadership as evidenced by first and/or senior authored publications in top tier journalsExperience in translational or clinical drug development including advanced understanding of critical development functions, e.g. Clinical Sciences, Biomarker Development, Translational Medicine, Clinical Pharmacology, Regulatory, Safety, Operations, Biostatistics, etc will be an advantageOutstanding presentation and communication skillsSuccessful demonstration of initiative, teamwork, collaboration and technical expertise as an independent and creative scientist.', 'The Position', 'Drive biomarker related regulatory strategies and interactions with health authorities around the globe including review of relevant regulatory documents', 'Demonstrated record of scientific leadership as evidenced by first and/or senior authored publications in top tier journals', 'Strive to publish scientific and methodological projects in high quality journals.', 'SCHEDULE', 'Represent biomarker related strategies and plans to biomarker review forums, decision committees and project teams.', 'Job Facts', 'PhD, MD or PhD/MD degree in a relevant scientific field (e.g. pathology, immunology, molecular biology, cancer genetics, cancer biology, molecular oncology, signaling)', ' The Position ', 'JOB TYPE', 'Harness existing study data sets to inform reverse translational research efforts', 'Outstanding presentation and communication skills', 'Successful demonstration of initiative, teamwork, collaboration and technical expertise as an independent and creative scientist.', 'Primary Responsibilities', 'Represent OBD externally through presentations at key scientific meetings and interactions with investigators']

meetings and work effectively as part of a team.', 'Job Facts', 'Who You Are', 'Have excellent communication skills and be committed to teamwork-oriented discovery.', 'The Position', 'Applicants must have a PhD degree and post-doctoral experience in immunology, molecular biology, biochemistry or related field and will have a good understanding of cytokine biology and cytokine receptor signaling.Have a documented record of professional achievement in the form of high-quality publications.Be theoretically and practically well versed in immunology and molecular immunology techniques such as primary cell isolation from tissues, in vitro stimulation of hematopoietic / immune cells, advanced flow cytometry (8+ colors), cellular immunological assays, molecular biology, ELISA/MSD, qRT-PCR/RNAseq/scRNA-Seq, WB and have experience or be willing to develop in-vivo models to test pathways.Have excellent communication skills and be committed to teamwork-oriented discovery.Can present research at intra- and inter-departmental meetings and work effectively as part of a team.Qualified candidates should be adept at independently designing, executing and interpreting experiments.', 'Qualified candidates should be adept at independently designing, executing and interpreting experiments.', 'JOB FUNCTION', 'Be theoretically and practically well versed in immunology assays, molecular biology, ELISA/MSD, qRT-PCR/RNAseq/scRNA-Seq, WB and have experience or be willing to develop in-vivo models to test pathways.', 'Who We Are', 'JOB TYPE', 'Applicants must have a PhD degree and post-doctoral experience in immunology, molecular biology, biochemistry or related field and will have a good understanding of cytokine biology and cytokine receptor signaling.']

['', ' Teamwork and Collaboration', ' Ability to work independently with appropriate consultation as needed', ' Responsible for leading the aligned identification and selection of biomarker vendors in collaboration with the biomarker scientist and GPPS across a program', 'Qualifications', 'JOB FUNCTION', ' Inspiring and Influencing', 'Creates and manages biomarker operations program plan timelines, resources, budget, analyze risk and quality', ' Clinical or biological laboratory experience with evidence of involvement in the processing and/ or analysis of biological samples', ' Clinical or biological laboratory experience with evidence of involvement in the processing and/ or analysis of biological samples Strong leadership and motivational skills developed through leading successful multi-functional matrix teams. Global experience preferred. Ability to maintain knowledge of novel scientific technologies & platforms that may impact planning or ongoing operational strategies Strong analytical skills, ability to analyze complex activities and information to arrive at logical conclusions Previous experience with budget forecasting and analyzing biomarker vendor service capabilities is a plus Demonstrated leadership, influencing, communication and project management skills Demonstrated ability to think strategically and develop and execute biomarker/analytical operations strategies in a global setting Ability to anticipate and solve problems Demonstrated excellent team and interpersonal skills, ability to communicate with energy and passion, to engage and inspire others Effective communication skills; fluency in verbal and written English, any other language skills may be an asset Ability to work independently with appropriate consultation as needed Functional or Line management (coaching, mentoring and developing staff) experience a plus', ' Ensures escalation of issues and risks that significantly affect biomarker program timelines, budget or quality to the Biomarker Scientist, OPL and GPPS.', ' Functional or Line management (coaching, mentoring and developing staff) experience a plus', ' Demonstrated excellent team and interpersonal skills, ability to communicate with energy and passion, to engage and inspire others', ' Provides program leadership to matrix teams within PDG Biomarker Operations by providing program specific guidance, clinical biomarker operations expertise, strategies, best practices, lessons learned and direction to achieve results', ' Achieving Results', 'Experience', ' Ensures Biomarker Operations Project Managers receive applicable training; including therapeutic area training, biomarker strategy training etc in collaboration with the BTALs.', ' Oversees the operational implementation of the program biomarker strategies.', ' Represents Biomarker Operations or takes a leadership role in non-molecular projects (NMPs) and actively contributes to the optimization of existing as well as the development of new processes in PDG/PD within and across Therapeutic Areas (TAs)', ' Communicates initial budget, timelines and changes to stakeholders as appropriate.', ' Strong analytical skills, ability to analyze complex activities and information to arrive at logical conclusions', 'Research COMPANY/DIVISION', ' Responsible for developing and executing the biomarker operations and companion diagnostics plan for a program including scenario planning, high level forecasting of timelines, assessment of program level feasibility, estimation of budget and resources (in collaboration with the BTALs), and development of high level operational strategies', 'Ensures biomarker operational program adherence to ICH/GCP and SOPs', ' Demonstrated leadership, influencing, communication and project management skills', ' Primary contact for key internal stakeholders e.g. Biomarker Operations Project Managers (BOPM), Biomarker Scientist, Study Management Operations and Project Leader (OPL).', ' Accountable for biomarker analysis budget forecasts, with appropriate input from the BOPMs, vendors and biomarker scientists to ensure efficient expenditure and minimal variance between actual and planned spend.', ' Technical and Business Expertise', 'Position Purpose', ' As a core member of the Biomarker Subteam (BMST) and the Companion Diagnostics Project Team (JPT), the Biomarker Operations Program Leader (BOPL) contributes at a broad and strategic level by developing, implementing and overseeing the Biomarker and Companion Diagnostics Operations strategy for Product Development programs. The BOPL is accountable for the efficient delivery of a biomarker operations program plan (i.e. BOP in Oncology) in accordance with time, cost and quality commitments including ICH/GCP and applicable regulations. Provides program and indication- specific biomarker operational expertise, innovative and flexible operational solutions and options for the molecule‚Äôs Biomarker and CDx plan within the BMST and/ or JPT', ' Demonstrated ability to think strategically and develop and execute biomarker/analytical operations strategies in a global setting', 'Main Responsibilities And Accountabilities', ' Chairs Biomarker Working Group meetings , if applicable, and other meetings involving internal or external stakeholders (Biomarker Scientists, Operational Functions, Data Management and Vendors as appropriate).', ' Decision Making', ' Drives setting of biomarker operational program goals and milestones and monitors progress (i.e. BOP in Oncology). Reviews the biomarker operational plan with the biomarker scientist for alignment within the TA, indication or molecule. Responsible to communicate and to follow up on any relevant changes to the biomarker operations plan which require implementation across the program. Communicates initial budget, timelines and changes to stakeholders as appropriate. Liaise with BTAL(s) to review resource needs regularly Oversees the operational implementation of the program biomarker strategies. Accountable for biomarker analysis budget forecasts, with appropriate input from the BOPMs, vendors and biomarker scientists to ensure efficient expenditure and minimal variance between actual and planned spend. Ensures biomarker analysis data is available in accordance with the biomarker program plan, as applicable Ensures escalation of issues and risks that significantly affect biomarker program timelines, budget or quality to the Biomarker Scientist, OPL and GPPS. job_title: Senior Scientific Researcher, Oncology Biomarker Development
job_text: ['', 'Research COMPANY/DIVISION', 'You will have an intimate knowledge of, and extensive hands-on experience with, relevant molecular (e.g. PCR, DNA manipulation) and cell biology techniques (e.g. primary and derivative cell culture and transfection).', 'JOB FUNCTION', 'Preferred candidates will have experience in oncology, development of biomarker assays, and their implementation in clinical trials.', 'Who We Are', 'Successful candidates will have a BS, MS degree, and at least 6 years of hands-on laboratory research experience.You will have an intimate knowledge of, and extensive hands-on experience with, relevant molecular (e.g. PCR, DNA manipulation) and cell biology techniques (e.g. primary and derivative cell culture and transfection).Preferred candidates will have experience in oncology, development of biomarker assays, and their implementation in clinical trials.Candidates must have excellent communication skills and the ability to work with scientists and associates from multiple laboratories, disciplines and departments.A proven track record, including authorship of and / or contributions to, publications in top tier journals is required.', 'Requirements', 'The Position', 'Signaling:  Substantial expertise in oncology, cancer cell signaling pathways, cancer immunotherapy and translational research is highly desirable. The ideal candidate will also be proficient with in vitro methodologies used to assess candidate mechanisms of resistance and familiar with computational methodologies and platforms used for generating and analyzing high-content NGS data including single-cell RNASeq. Experiences with NGS, digital PCR, DNA methylation analysis, strong data sciences, statistical / bioinformatic analysis and programming skill a plus. ', 'Cancer Immunotherapy (CIT): ', 'Signaling: ', 'Candidates must have excellent communication skills and the ability to work with scientists and associates from multiple laboratories, disciplines and departments.', 'Primary Role', 'SCHEDULE', 'Job Facts', 'This is a local hire only designated position, as relocation assistance is not available for the position', 'Specific responsibilities will include processing and analyzing clinical trial samples, data analysis, and presentation, and contributing to experimental design and planning.', 'Cancer Immunotherapy (CIT): Qualified candidate will participate in the discovery and investigation of novel drug targets in the therapeutic area of tumor inflammation and immunology. Using state of the art techniques and technologies, he/she will be involved in the purification of immune cells for in-vitro cell culture, T cell functional assays including in vitro stimulation, multi-color flow cytometry, and investigation of new molecular pathways using cellular and molecular techniques to investigate receptor/ligand interactions for potential therapeutic utility. Direct experience with animal models of immune response and/or anti-tumor immunity is preferred.', 'JOB TYPE', 'A proven track record, including authorship of and / or contributions to, publications in top tier journals is required.', 'Hematology: The major responsibility will focus on the lab-based identification and validation of the mechanisms conferring sensitivity and resistance to many of Genentech/Roche‚Äôs Early and Late Stage assets in hematologic malignancies. Expertise in oncology, signaling, cancer immunotherapy and translational research is highly desirable. The ideal candidate will also be familiar with methodologies and platforms used for analyzing high-content NGS data. The successful candidate will be involved in cross-functional project teams in the hematology disease areas. The candidate will review available biomarker data from clinical studies, develop, and execute experimental plans supporting reverse translational research. ', 'Responsibilities', 'Hematology:', 'Responsible for translational research to enable the development of biomarkers and assays for use in the clinical development of our candidate medicines. ', 'Experimental strategies will include the application of state of the art molecular and genomic technologies to analyze clinical samples.', 'Responsible for translational research to enable the development of biomarkers and assays for use in the clinical development of our candidate medicines. Experimental strategies will include the application of state of the art molecular and genomic technologies to analyze clinical samples.Specific responsibilities will include processing and analyzing clinical trial samples, data analysis, and presentation, and contributing to experimental design and planning.', 'Successful candidates will have a BS, MS degree, and at least 6 years of hands-on laboratory research experience.']
